eventTypes.description: The TYPE of the event which caused granting of points. It can be 'LOGIN' or 'DEPOSIT' or 'BET'

items.description: The TYPE of the event which caused granting of points. It can be 'LOGIN' or 'DEPOSIT' or 'BET'

eventType.description: The TYPE of the event which caused granting of points. It can be 'LOGIN' or 'DEPOSIT' or 'BET'

platformId.description: The ID of the event which caused granting of points.

pointsGiven.description: Amount of points given with this event.

currentPoints.description: The total number of points which the player have at that moment. This includes the points given with this event.

claimable.description: Whether bonuses are claimable at this moment

remainingTimeToClaim.description:
Number of minutes after which sweepstakes bonuses can be claimed. Possible values:
null - this will be the value if claimable field is false and if bonus can not claimed in the future
0 - no remaining time, bonuses can be claimed immediately
other than 0 - remaining minutes until bonuses will be claimable

claimBonusConfigured.description: Whether claim bonus configuration is present

claimLimitsReached.description: Whether some claim limits are reached.

tag.description: Tag(in case of crypto) used to receive money for transaction

totp.description: One time password if 2fa is enabled

network.description: Network (in case of crypto) in which the transaction will be executed
Network (in case of crypto) in which the transaction will be executed

totp.description: One time password if 2fa is enabled

email.description: Player email. This is the main identifier of the player, thus it must be unique for a brand

ipCountryCode.description: Two digit country code based on the playe ip from which he/she is registring. Used for fraud detection if it is different than the countryCode

languageCode.description: The language code of the player

phoneNumber.description: The phone number containing all the phone data: country code + phone number

zip.description: Zip code. Only for countries where it is applicable

contactEmail.description: Whether the player agrees to contact him via email using his/her contact data

contactSms.description: Whether the player agrees to contact him via sms using his/her contact data

customerId.description: The generated customer id, which is unique for all brands

nickName.description: Nickname to be checked for existence

authDate.description: Epoch seconds of the login, send by TG

hash.description: Hash string that is signed by TG with the auth token of the bot

dataCheckString.description: String of all properties sent by TG, ordered alphabetically, that should be signed and verified against the hash

preferredGameLaunchCurrency.description: The player game launchCurrency for the player

ftd.description: Whether the customer is new one and has only one deposit by now

errorWithdrawals.description: The customer life time withdrawals with 'error' status, in the actual currency

initiatedWithdrawals.description: The customer life time withdrawals with 'initated' status in the actual currency

bonusAwarded.description: Sum of the face value of the bonuses which have been awarded to the customer in their lifetime in the actual currency
